attributes.action: NO TO PRIVATIESATION OF  ROYAL MAIL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Royal mail is now making money, so dont sell it off to private for profit while losing 50,000 jobs in the process, keep royal mail ,keep the profits and keep the jobs, it just makes sense

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
